title: tiruvaDi unadinai
sahitya:
tiruvaDi unadinai sharaNama aDaiyavE varum aDiyEnukku aruL taruvAi murugA


anupallavi

  marupaDiyum enda piravi eDuttu varuttam urAda varattaip-peravE


caraNam    piravi adanil manak-kurai Eduvuminri perumidam urumo oru pEru peravE nAn
varayillAk-karuNai vAriyAgum unnai vAzhtti en talai tAzhtti vaNangi
